sentences.english: Hardanger is one of Norways most popular fjords.
sentences.chinese: 哈丹哥峽灣是挪威最受人歡迎的峽灣之一。

sentences.english: Hardanger is one of Norways most popular fjords.
sentences.chinese: 哈丹哥峽灣是挪威最受人歡迎的峽灣之一。

sentences.english: Some nice wooden houses like the stars drop on the edges of the fjord.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小木屋像點點繁星墜落在峽灣兩翼。

sentences.english: Besides bubble hot spring, this time can also visit Tamil ford fjords.
sentences.chinese: 除了泡溫泉，這個時節還可以去遊覽米爾福德峽灣。

sentences.english: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice-filled fiord.
sentences.chinese: 這次出行是爲了能駛入冰雪覆蓋的峽灣。

sentences.english: Tourists in Norway always take boat trips along the coast and into the fiords.
sentences.chinese: 挪威的旅遊者常常乘小船沿海岸線航行，並進入峽灣。

sentences.english: Here's a little bend along the Fuchun River.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是富春江上的一個小峽灣。

sentences.english: Very grateful to war songs, and shiver with cold wind fjord help many of his friends.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝戰歌和凜風峽灣的許多朋友的幫忙。

sentences.english: Seiches from this earthquake were observed in 2 lakes and 3 fjords in western Norway.
sentences.chinese: 假潮從這次地震觀察在2湖泊和3峽灣在挪威西部。

sentences.english: Near her in the quiet fjord lay the crack 10, 000-ton cruiser Prinz Eugen.
sentences.chinese: 就在她附近的峽灣裏還有1萬噸的歐根親王號巡洋艦。

sentences.english: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice -filled fiord.
sentences.chinese: 這次出行是爲了能駛入冰雪覆蓋的峽灣。

sentences.english: Pieces of glacier that break off become mixed with thin sea ice in a jumble of ice fragments on the fjord's surface.
sentences.chinese: 脫落的冰川碎塊與峽灣表面混亂的碎海冰融合在一起。

sentences.english: Utgarde's design ties closely into the creation of Howling Fjord as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 烏特加德的設計與整個號叫峽灣的設計緊密關聯。

sentences.english: The wonderful Beijing Happy Valley trip will start from "Fjord Forest ".
sentences.chinese: 奇妙的北京歡樂谷之旅，將從“峽灣森林”開始。

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
Andes mountain chain of South America
Wusu city in Tacheng prefecture 塔城地區|塔城地区[Ta3 cheng2 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
Arxan county level city, Mongolian Rashaant xot, in Hinggan league 興安盟|兴安盟[Xing1 an1 meng2], east Inner Mongolia
